purple.description: Sequential scale from light to dark purple, using only approved Kearney purples
purple.accessibility: WCAG AA compliant on white background from index 4 onwards. Dark end uses greys (not old purples).

neutral.description: Sequential scale from light to dark grey

purpleToGrey.description: Diverging scale for showing deviation from center

primary.description: Categorical palette for distinct categories, max 6 recommended
primary.usage: Use purple as primary/highlight, greys for supporting categories

emphasis.description: NO green/red/orange. Use purple for emphasis, greys for semantic states with text labels.

trend.description: Use neutral greys with symbols (▲ ▼ ─) for direction. NO green/red color-coding.

spotColor.description: Use to highlight key insights in charts

rules.label_first: Prefer mark labels over axis labels
rules.spot_color: Use spot color to emphasize key data points or insights
rules.no_pie_gauge: Never use pie charts or gauge charts
rules.collision_avoidance: Ensure labels never overlap with data marks
rules.color_semantics: NO green/red/orange. Use purple + grey only with text indicators for state.

meta.generation_method: Approved Kearney brand palette - white + slate + purple accent
meta.brand_note: All colors strictly from Kearney approved palette. Old dark purples (#601FB5, #4A188E, #341167) removed.
